name: Gainful
headline: Personalized Performance Nutrition
description:
Gainful is performance nutrition that unlocks your full potential. We provide personalized products and 1:1 Registered Dietitian support to empower active people to reach their unique goals by transforming their health.

Founded in 2017, Gainful is backed by some of the world’s best venture investors (including Y Combinator, BrandProject, and Courtside VC). Our current products are Personalized Protein, Personalized Hydration, Personalized Pre-Workout, and our line of Performance Boosts (Collagen, Creatine, and Fiber).
generated_description:
Gainful is a New York-based startup founded in 2017, part of the Y Combinator Batch W18. The company focuses on personalized performance nutrition, aiming to help active individuals optimize their health and fitness through tailored products. Gainful's lineup includes customizable protein supplements, hydration solutions, pre-workouts, and performance boosts (like collagen and creatine). They stand out by offering personalized consultations with registered dietitians, ensuring that each customer receives the nutrition that best suits their unique goals.

The company is backed by prominent investors, including Y Combinator, BrandProject, and Courtside VC, and has grown to a team of about 30 employees. Gainful's mission revolves around empowering individuals to unlock their full potential by transforming their nutritional health.

Promotions currently offered include discounts on product bundles and free shipping on orders over $75. Their website features an interactive quiz that helps customers find the products best suited to their needs, reflecting their commitment to personalization.

As for their formulations, Gainful emphasizes clean, effective ingredients devoid of artificial additives. They cater to various dietary preferences, offering whey, keto, and plant-based protein options. Over time, they’ve garnered a loyal customer base, boasting over 300,000 satisfied users.

For more details or to explore their products, visit [Gainful's website](https://gainful.com).
